alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 6:01PM MDT until May 28 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT FOR SOUTHERN HARDING AND NORTHEASTERN BUTTE COUNTIES... At 601 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Ladner to 6 miles northwest of Sheep Buttes, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Buffalo, Reva, Camp Crook, Hoover, West Short Pines, Slim Buttes, Deers Ears Butte, Sheep Buttes and Lake Gardner. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
